nodes.text: Evocar was a work written by the Hutt Direus'Pei. It was commissioned by another Hutt, Kossak the Younger who sought to start a legend of being related to Hutt General Kossak Inijic Ar'durv, despite the relation being unconfirmed and play unfinished. However he was double-crossed by the playwright who disagreed with the subjugation of the Evocii, Direus'Pei and all copies of the play were then ordered erased by Maltorran protoplasm only to have a draft be saved by a scribe of the playwright.
